summary: Archmage robe derived from expert robe.
descriptionHtml:
Archmage Robes v1.2
by Sejh


English and french versions.

Should be rename mage_pack ;-)

All females robes modified by request.
Male archmage added by request.
Optional leggins by request.
Optional darker texture by request.


INSTALLATION

1. Manually download the file.
2. Unzip to extract the files.
3. Move HoodlessArchmageRobes-en.esp or HoodlessArchmageRobes-en.esp in your Data folder. If you are upgrading rename it HoodlessArchmageRobes.esp
3. Move content of vanillaboby folder in your Skyrim Data. Merge and overwrite if prompted.

The body textures need to be named as follow :

- femalebody_1.dds
- femalebody_1_msn.dds
- femalebody_1_s.dds
- femalebody_1_sk.dds


OPTIONAL :

a. Unpbody
If you want the Unpbody version, move content of unpboby folder in your Skyrim Data. Merge and overwrite if prompted.

b. Darker texture
Move content of optional/darkmage folder in your Skyrim Data. Merge and overwrite if prompted.

c. Robes with leggins
Vanilla body only, but should work with Unpbody
Move content of optional/leggins folder in your Skyrim Data. Merge and overwrite if prompted.

UNINSTALLING

To uninstall, just remove the installed files. These will be located in:

Data 
HoodlessArchmageRobes-en.esp or HoodlessArchmageRobes-fr.esp

Meshes
- Data\\meshes\\clothes\\archmage\\f\\
- Data\\meshes\\clothes\\archmage\\m\\
- Data\\meshes\\clothes\\mageapprentice\\f\\
- Data\\meshes\\clothes\\magejourneyman\\f\\

Textures
- Data\\textures\\clothes\\archmage\\f\\
- Data\\textures\\clothes\\archmage\\m\\
- Data\\textures\\clothes\\mageapprentice\\f\\
- Data\\textures\\clothes\\magejourneyman\\f\\


CREDITS

Boots meshes from Tera_human_armor.
Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
author: Sejh

files.name: sejh_archmage-1-2

Optional robes with leggins.
